page.title: 18ARTS & CRAFTS IN BRAMSHAW
page.content: {CLASSES FOR ARTS AND CRAFT.}Many of theskills have been learnt at further education classes and the WI. {HOME BASED ARTS AND CRAFT.}These skills include cookery & wine making, collage & embroidery, knitting & crochet, spinning, painting, pottery, carpentry & woodcarving. {COMMERCIAL ARTS & CRAFTS.}Some of the above mentioned are sometimes sold at exhibitions & bazaars. FC make & sell fencing posts & pailings, supply sailing masts. There is a china repairer in the area. {THE FORGE.}There is still a working forge shoeing horses & undertaking ornamental iron work on the premises.
